Class MainFilter

java.lang.Object
filter.MainFilter
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.servlet.Filter
@WebFilter(urlPatterns="/*") public class MainFilter extends Object implements javax.servlet.Filter
This filter manages user authentication and redirects users based on their session status. - If a user is not logged in, they are restricted from accessing protected pages. - If a user is already logged in, they are redirected away from login-related pages.
